text: Hit Reset is the second studio album by The Julie Ruin. It was released on July 8, 2016, on the Hardly Art label. ==Critical reception== Hit Reset has a score of 78 out of 100 on Metacritic, indicating that it has received "generally favorable reviews" from music critics. ===Accolades=== {|class="wikitable" |- ! Publication ! Accolade ! Year ! title: Hit Reset
